name: Juicer
description:
In the midst of fighting the alien invasion, your ship's engines have given out. You have only your weapons to propel you through space.  Your crew has fashioned your broken engine in a Alien Juicer. Kill your enemies with this Juicer to keep your weapons from overheating.

Watch out: some aliens are immune to your ships weapons,  while others might damage your ship if you try try to Juice them.

Controls

Click Mouse to Shoot 

I hope you enjoy! Please comment bellow about what you thought of the game or even tweet  @buffering_13
